thread.title: With starter Taylor limping, Bills sign QB Josh Johnson (Yahoo Sports)
thread.title_full: With starter Taylor limping, Bills sign QB Josh Johnson (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: With starter Taylor limping, Bills sign QB Josh Johnson (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,260 With starter Taylor limping, Bills sign QB Josh Johnson (Yahoo Sports) Tyrod Taylor's playing status is uncertain after the Bills starting quarterback hurt his left leg while rallying Buffalo to victory against Tennessee last weekend. The Bills took a precautionary step in addressing their quarterback depth behind backup EJ Manuel by signing free agent Josh Johnson on Tuesday. The move came a day after coach Rex Ryan said Taylor was ''beat up'' and ''sore'' following a 14-13 win against Tennessee.
